# alto

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

`alto` is an R package that 

- aligns topics from different LDA models,

- computes metrics for quantifying the goodness of alignment, 

- and provides visualization functions to explore the alignment and robustness of topics across environments or LDA hyper-parameters.
